import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Col, FloatingLabel, Form, Row, Button, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import NavBar from "../Shares/NavBar/NavBar"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import swal from "sweetalert"; //library for sending email alert const Connect = () => { const form = useRef(); // email-handler const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_b554qum", //create a service the paste the service_id hapa "template_9a01jlt", // create template and insert the template id here form.current, "ro5bLVe8W-O30P98K" // log in to email.js alafu use your key ) .then( (res) => { swal({ title: "Your Message Send Successfully", text: "Thank You", icon: "success", button: "ok", }); }, (error) => { swal({ title: `${error.text}`, text: "Sorry! Try Again", icon: "error", button: "ok", }); } ); e.target.reset(); }; return ( <>

Get In Touch
); }; export default Connect;
